page.title: 17Bradford Abbas:Amenities.
page.content: {There are lots of clubs in Bradford {Abbas.}One of them is the{Sports Club. The Sports Club has 2 tennis courts. Indoors it has 2 snooker tables and 1 pool table. It has a skittle alley and 2 bars. There is also a dart board and 2 sets of toilets. They have a good cricket pitch, 2 football pitches and it also has bowls. In the Sports Club grounds there is a Dog Show each year. There is a very active{Variety Club which put on a series of acts for entertainment. The village school has a swimming club, basic gym club, cricket club,soccer club and badminton club. There are also the W.I., Cubs, Brownies and Guides.The fund raising committee raises thousands of pounds each year.
